channel.title: AcerX ~ In Early Stages [RELEASED!]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]AcerX[/size] THIS SOURCE HAS BEEN RELEASED!!!!!!!!!! THREAD LINK: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,479874.0.html Okay. Well. I started developing this source a while ago. Theres no point in me using this. Its my first source. Base - Delta Credits Delta - Creating the base Me - Coding Moparscape.org - Tuts, Guides, Ect.
Here are some pictures I took : (THERES QUITE A BIT BTW ;) ALL PICTURES ARE BY ME!) soz for bad quality xD [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/531/agsspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/1978/ancientsandlunar.jpg[/img] [img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/5606/assult.jpg[/img] [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/135/barrowsh.jpg[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/43/bgsspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/7503/dbowspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/9548/dragaxespec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/5417/explodeinjail.jpg[/img] [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/7689/fightpitsq.jpg[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/501/fixedmaster.jpg[/img] [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/5949/funpk.jpg[/img] [img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/5033/newpanel.jpg[/img] [img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/4898/nolagwith200npcs.jpg[/img] [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/1686/pestcontrol.jpg[/img] [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/193/pietyworks.jpg[/img] [img]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/4295/powdclaws.jpg[/img] [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/9669/sgsspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/658/skillcapesi.jpg[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/7918/vestasstatiuszuriels.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]FEATURES!!!!!![/size] - Customs. Such as Vestas, Statius ect. and Dragonlight with special attack! - New Custom Donator Area! Never seen before! - New Home. Im sick of gay old boring edgeville. - Good shops (Incl. Donator Shop That Accepts Paramya Tickets) - Edgeville is - Jail! Added And Removed objects to look neater! Removed the mine 250 silver ores thing! And you cant use explosive potion in Jail! - FunPK! Duel Arena is FunPK But NPCS, Players, Explosive potions cant make you loose items! - Fight Pits - Barrows - Assult Minigame with working shop items - Can hold 250+ npcs in 1 small area without lagging a bit! Theres a pic of it but i couldn't vid :( Sorry :( - Full Godsword Stances Picture of it is located at the top - 4-Hit Dragon Claws Special Attack! Theres a picture of it - ::message instead of ::yell to stop spammers Ill add more later aswell! Theres much more features! Cool commands! Ill post them later :) [size=14pt]Commands![/size] master mute ipmute banuser ipban message alert home donarzone (To make someone a donator look in the char file) rareweps (Godswords and Dragon Claws) suggest dparty dparty2 players modzone visitjail maxcash t2g500 t2g1000 (ect) jail unjail prank USERNAME (This is kinda funny if u wanna embarrass someone) givemod giveadmin giveowner demote afk back whitepower god godoff jump jumpoff shops object helpdesk help home char newitem lunar prayer tz food torags dharoks veracs guthans ahrims karils pkweps veng onpickup offpickup spec people update mypos worship pnpc unpc npc emote interface auto spawn alert changepassword players bootall kick npcrefresh gfx tele xteletome xteleto xteleall
Please Comment and Rate. .Kami/Mee0345/Mee/itzkn1f3z <------- xD

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:17, topic:377848”]this is so special. =.=
dead and goneeee.[/quote]
if noob.troll = true; && noobness = (2417000000)
then rep-- noob = true;
is cool = false;
sM(“GF NERD ENJOY 0 REP”);
}

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Mee0345, post:9, topic:377848”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=473732.msg3464017#msg3464017 date=1294763099]
Well that is kind of a interesting statement.

Suggestion: Delete all the customs and I suppose keep the Skillcapes, I know the members will be requesting those.
[/quote]
Yeah. Ill be on it right away.
THESE ARE THE ITEMS I WANT TO KEEP
Godswords
Dragon Claws
Saradomin Sword
Skillcapes.
Is that good? Or Just Skillcapes. I know alot of people love dragon claws and godswords

LOL!!! MY REP JUMPED AFTER I POSTED THIS O.O![/quote]
If people want them, then do not remove them.

Read full topic

item.title: AcerX ~ In Early Stages [RELEASED!]
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:6, topic:377848”][quote author=Mee0345 link=topic=473732.msg3464007#msg3464007 date=1294762699]

I am most worried about this development, I can see that Deltascape has been ruined with these custom items. This also including the items that aren’t suppose to be in a 317. Nevertheless, good luck with the development.

Hmm.
Maybe If I Delete the customs but keep the skillcapes?
Would that make it better? I look up to you and see you as a god. So it kinda is your choice xD
Ok. So shall i delete the customs?
[/quote]
It’s not the decision for me to make as it’s not mine. I’m just stating I don’t like the customs, do as you wish with the server.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: AcerX ~ In Early Stages [RELEASED!]
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

[size=24pt]AcerX[/size]
THIS SOURCE HAS BEEN RELEASED!!!
THREAD LINK:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Okay. Well.
I started developing this source a while ago. Theres no point in me using this.
Its my first source.
Base - Delta
Credits
Delta - Creating the base
Me - Coding
Moparscape.org - Tuts, Guides, Ect.

Here are some pictures I took : (THERES QUITE A BIT BTW ALL PICTURES ARE BY ME!) soz for bad quality xD


















[size=18pt]FEATURES!!![/size]

  • Customs. Such as Vestas, Statius ect. and Dragonlight with special attack!
  • New Custom Donator Area! Never seen before!
  • New Home. Im sick of gay old boring edgeville.
  • Good shops (Incl. Donator Shop That Accepts Paramya Tickets)
  • Edgeville is
  • Jail! Added And Removed objects to look neater! Removed the mine 250 silver ores thing! And you cant use explosive potion in Jail!
  • FunPK! Duel Arena is FunPK But NPCS, Players, Explosive potions cant make you loose items!
  • Fight Pits
  • Barrows
  • Assult Minigame with working shop items
  • Can hold 250+ npcs in 1 small area without lagging a bit! Theres a pic of it but i couldn’t vid Sorry
  • Full Godsword Stances Picture of it is located at the top
  • 4-Hit Dragon Claws Special Attack! Theres a picture of it
  • ::message instead of ::yell to stop spammers
    Ill add more later aswell! Theres much more features!
    Cool commands! Ill post them later
    [size=14pt]Commands![/size]
    master
    mute
    ipmute
    banuser
    ipban
    message
    alert
    home
    donarzone (To make someone a donator look in the char file)
    rareweps (Godswords and Dragon Claws)

    dparty2
    players
    modzone
    visitjail
    maxcash
    t2g500
    t2g1000 (ect)

    unjail
    prank USERNAME (This is kinda funny if u wanna embarrass someone)
